job_history.work_description: Responsible for overseeing and organizing customer files. Maintained confidential customer and company information. Established strong relationships with our accounting, sales, and managers. Packaged customer contracts with all required documents to go out to different lenders for financing. Maintained strong relationships with lender representatives.

Responsible for making sure that the applicant was verified and met all requirements to be approved for the loan, all information on applications were correct. Made bank deposits daily. Maintained adequate cash supply in cash drawers in multiple checkout stations. Performed store opening duties, including counting cash drawers and checking all equipment for proper functioning. Accurately logged all daily activity with customers who were due, and over due.

Processed car deals, verified costs including reconditioning and equipment add-ons. Managed all information regarding motor vehicle registration including legal and state-required documents. Responsible for preparing all tax, title documents and payoff checks for new vehicles and trade-ins. Posted vehicle sales and purchases. Cut checks for vehicle purchases from auction dealers and customer referrals. Created spreadsheets to log all vehicle purchases. Processed all aftermarket vehicle add ons.

Managed the receptionist area, including greeting visitors and responding to busy multi-line telephone and in-person requests for information. Maintained the front desk and reception area in a neat and organized fashion. Constant entering of data into database while maintaining all other duties. Receiving money, receipting, customer service and all other basic secretarial duties.

Effectively completed procedures involving receiving, marking, and checking in merchandise. Issued receipts, refunds, credits, or changed due to customers. Assisted Managers in the day-to-day running of the store in line with Corporate Sales procedures.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in customer-facing roles, including CSR, Cashier/Receptionist, and Cashier/CSR, indicating strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Consistently performed data entry tasks in various roles, showing a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Cash Handling
skills.explanation: Handled cash and maintained cash drawers in multiple roles, indicating a solid working proficiency in cash handling.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Likely used Microsoft Office for data entry and other tasks, but no extensive experience is mentioned, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers, managers, and other stakeholders in various roles, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Organizational Skills
skills.explanation: Maintained organized workspaces and managed multiple tasks in various roles, showing a solid working proficiency in organizational skills.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.explanation: Verified information and maintained accurate records in various roles, indicating a solid working proficiency in attention to detail.
